m_szDocTitle: Patent US20060026017 - National / international management and security system for responsible ... - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: FIG. 1 [0029] Shows the first commercialization of the Primary Focal Node or PFN, which began in 1995 as a wireless protected platform in the form of a stop and control box. [0030] The Patent or full technology and teachings are provided here as Appendix I [0031] FIG. 2 [0032] Summarizes the second patent application filed in 1997 which further developed the wireless equipment controller platform as a protected primary focal node powered by everyday equipment applications and provide data back on the environment and economy. [0033] The full technology and teachings are provided here as Appendi
